biotools.summary: TNMplot.com is a free, interactive web tool for comparing gene expression in normal, tumor, and metastatic tissues across over 56,900 samples (TCGA, GTEx, GEO). It supports pan-cancer and tissue-specific analysis, offering boxplots, violin plots, sensitivity–specificity curves, and stage-specific comparisons.
